mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_Summary_Salary_Monthly WHERE empId = #{empId} and yearMonth =#{yearMonth} and isDelete = 0

SELECT
FROM t_Summary_Salary_Monthly WHERE 1=1 and isDelete = 0
and empName like '%${empName}%'
and deptName like '%${deptName}%'
and type = #{type}
and yearMonth = #{yearMonth}
order by createTime desc
mapper.update: update t_Summary_Salary_Monthly set isDelete = 1 where yearMonth = #{yearMonth}
